THERE ARE 44 THINGS A GUY SHOULD DO FOR A GIRL

are you remembering this?

6-hug her

keep reading

11-smile with her

14-when she says she loves you more, deny it. fight back
15-when her friends say i love her more than you, deny it. fight back and
hug her tight so she cant get to her friends. it makes her feel loved

Are you thinking about someone?

16-always hug her and say i love you when you see her
17-kiss her unexpectedly
18-HUG HER FROM BEHIND AROUND THE WAIST
19-tell her shes beautiful not sexy!
20-tell her the way you feel about her!

..20 you need to show her you mean it too

21-kiss her on the lips
22-DONT ask her to buy you stuff. you buy HER stuff
23-TELL HER WHAT FEELS GOOD

25-always listen to what she has to say

i hope every girl gets treated this good...

26-don't lie to her!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
27-dont cheat on her!!!!!!!!!!!!!
28-take her anywhere she wants

school, and how much you miss her
30-be there for her when ever she needs you, & even when she doesn't need
you, just be there so she'll know that she can always count on you

are you still reading this, you better be its important

31. Hold her close when she's cold and she can hold you too.
32. When you are alone hold her close and kiss her.
33. Kiss her on the cheek; (it will give her the hint that you want to kiss them).
34. While in the movie, put your arm around her and then she will
automatically put her head on your shoulder, then lean in and tilt her chin
up and kiss her lightly.
35. Dont ever tell her to leave even jokingly or act like you're mad. If
shes upset, comfort her

remember this next time you are with her

36. When people diss her, stand up for her.
37. Look deep into her eyes and tell her you love her.
38. Lay down under the stars and put her head on your chest so she can
listen to the steady beat of your heart, Link your fingers together while
you whisper to her as she rests her eyes and listens to you.

39. When walking next to each other grab her hand.
40. When you hug her hold her in your arms as long as possible

MAKE SURE SHE KNOWS SHES LOVED

41. Call her at night to wish her sweet dreams.
42. Comfort her when she cries and wipe away her tears.
43. Take her for long walks at night.
44. Always Remind her how much you love her.

you'll never know when she needs just a lil more love

If you are a girl send this on as Things A Girl Would Love and if you are a
guy send this on as What we Should do......You have 5 minutes to send this
on
If you dont send this on in 5 minutes you will have HORRIBLE relationships

age shouldn't matter

David is a 10th grader who is best friends with Bobby

Sarah is an 8th grader who is Bobby's sister

Everyday David comes to Sarah's house to hang out with her brother, and Sarah likes David alot and David likes Sarah but he doesn't want anyone to know because she is an eighth grader. DO NOT IGNORE!!!!!!!

Friday:

David in is on the phone with Bobby, Sarah hears that David is coming over to watch the game. Sarah gets all dressed up for David.
2 minutes later
David comes in...

David- Yo Bobby, you home?!
Sarah- *smiling* Oh he's getting dressed
David- *smiles* Okay then I'll wait
Sarah- Umm do you want a drink?
David- Okay, but i don't want to bother u, I can get it
Sarah- Oh it's cool, I'll get it

Sarah walks slowly behind his back and smiles....few seconds later she comes out with the drink. Sarah accidently spills the drink on the floor, and almost falls. David grabs her by the waist before she could fall. They looked at eachother...

David- Are u okay?
Sarah- Yeah thanks...
David- Umm...so...
Sarah- I'll go get some more drinks
David- No, its okay... umm you can sit down if u want
Sarah- Okay-*quietly sits*
David- How is school...anyone u like?
Sarah- No...
David- Is it cool if i crash here tonight?
Sarah- Of course... why not
David- Is anyone else coming besides me
Sarah- Yeah, my cousin
David- Okay, I didn't want you to feel like the only girl
Sarah- *Nods and smiles*

7 minutes

A knock comes to her door... it was her cousin Nikki...Sarah jumps and whispers ''he's here'' they went to sit down and watched the game.... a few minutes later they got bored so Nikki went up to Sarah's room.

Nikki- So u really like David huh?
Sarah- Yeah, but i don't think he would like an eighth grader
Nikki- Well how'd you know?
Sarah- Ummm because he is a tenth grader
Nikki- Ask him.. just say do u like me?
Sarah- NO!!!! Are you crazy he might think im wierd

5 minutes

Bobby and David were downstairs watching the game. It was half time. They started talking about some guy stuff. Bobby saw what happened when his sister spilled the drink, he didn't want his best friend to date his sister. He saw Sarah and Nikki listening and peaking through the door crack. He smiled and began to talk, pretending he doesn't see them

Bobby- Do you like my sister?
David- NO! *nervous* c'mon man she's a...
Bobby- Yes, you do
David- NO! I said no already why don't u believe me
Bobby- Why don't you like her?
David- She's not my type and she's ugly
Bobby- Whoa! Okay ...

Bobby sees his sister like she is about to cry... then Bobby feels guilty. It was dinner time and Nikki ordered pizza. David looks at Sarah and smiles. Sarah looked the other way with her eyes about to water. David looked confused.

43 minutes

The pizza came. Bobby paid for the pizza and everyone took a slice exept for Sarah.

Nikki- Hey i thought you said you were hungry, why aren't you eating?!
Sarah- *nods slowly while looking down* Not hungry.
Bobby- C'mon Sarah eat... you know you want to.
Sarah- *Nods slowly*

8 minutes

Sarah walked to her room while everyone was eating.

Nikki- What's up with Sarah, she loves pizza.?
David- Is she mad?
Bobby- Iono... Nikki go talk to her
Nikki- Leave her alone she'll come down

37 minutes

The game starts and Sarah still hadn't came down. Bobby knows what he did was wrong.

Bobby- Aye yo David go talk to Sarah.
David- But she's mad
Bobby- *throws a pillow at him* Shut up, and try to make her come down.

David goes up nervously and knocks on the door. Sarah opens the door.

Sarah- What?

David- Uhmm the games starting, Wunna watch it?
Sarah- *rolls her eyes* No!

She closed the door.... David blocked the door from closing and goes into her room.

David- Look! Why are you acting like this?!!
Sarah- Like what?!
David- Your all mad! I- I- Its not you!
Sarah- Oh so I'm acting different?? I heard you talking with my brother okay!
David- Ohh...Well I didn't mean it
Sarah- Whatever! Just leave!
David- No! I won't leave until you're not mad at me anymore! Look Sarah i didn't mean what i said... the whole thing i said was the opposite of what i think of u!!
Sarah- Then why did u say it??!
David- I don't know why...
Sarah- Is it because I'm an eighth grader?
David- No... Yeah .... Look okay to tell you the truth i really like u. And i mean it!
Sarah- Well to tell YOU the truth so do I.

They both smiled. David looks at Sarah and she looks at him. They lean close to eachother and just started kissing.

* If you dont repost this your true love will hate u and move on!
* If you do your true love will kiss you whenever you'll see her/him.

Repost this as age shouldn't matter

this shit is funny

The virgin girl is on the phone and asks her boyfriend to come

over and have dinner with her parents. Since this is such a

big event, the girl announces to her boyfriend that

after dinner, she would like to go out and make love

for the first time.

* * * * * * * * *

Well, the boy is ecstatic, but he has never had sex

before, so he takes a trip to the pharmacist to get

some condoms. He tells the pharmacist it's his first time and

the pharmacist helps the boy for about an hour.

He tells the boy everything there is to know about condoms and

sex.

* * * * * * * * *

At the register, the pharmacist asks the boy how many

condoms he'd like to buy, a 3-pack, 10-pack, or family

pack. The boy insists on the family pack because he

thinks he will be rather busy, it being his first time and all.

* * * * * * * * *

That night, the boy shows up at the girl's parents

house and meets his girlfriend at the door. "Oh, I'm

so excited for you to meet my parents, come on in!"

* * * * * * * * *

The boy goes inside and is taken to the dinner table

where the girl's parents are seated. The boy quickly

offers to say grace and bows his head.

* * * * * * * * *

A minute passes, and the boy is still deep in prayer,

with his head down.

* * * * * * * * *

10 minutes pass, and still no movement from the boy.

* * * * * * * * *

Finally, after 20 minutes with his head down, the

girlfriend leans over and whispers to the

boyfriend, "I had no idea you were this religious."

* * * * * * * *

The boy turns, and whispers back, "I had no idea your

father was a pharmacist."

* * * * * * * * *

numberz

I want your number....Don't care who u r (preferably boiz tho) . I bet u wont 2 give it to me.....I dare ya! copy and paste this and see how many numbers u can get hehe

women comeback

Man: Where have you been all my life?
Woman: Hiding from you.

Man: Haven't I seen you someplace before?
Woman: Yes, that's why I don't go there anymore.

Man: Is this seat empty?
Woman: Yes, and this one will be if you sit down.

Man: Your place or mine?
Woman: Both. You go to yours, and I'll go to mine.

Man: So, what do you do for a living?
Woman: I'm a female impersonator.

Man: Hey baby, what's your sign?
Woman: Do not enter.

Man: How do you like your eggs in the morning?
Woman: Unfertilized.

Man: Your body is like a temple.
Woman: Sorry, there are no services today.

Man: I would go to the end of the world for you.
Woman: But would you stay there?

Man: If I could see you naked, I'd die happy.
Woman: If I saw you naked, I'd probably die laughing.

Man: If I could rearrange the alphabet I'd put u and i together
Woman: Really, I'd put f and u

the perfect BF

Body: Every girl dreamed since they were a little girl is that one day she will find a guy that does these things for her. even the smallest action can have the BIGGEST impact in someones life.

• give her one of your t-shirts to sleep in.
• leave her cute text notes.
• kiss her in front of your friends.
• tell her she looks beautiful.
• look into her eyes when you talk to her.
• let her mess with your hair.
• touch her hair.
• just walk around with her.
• FORGIVE her for her MISTAKES.
• look at her like she's the only girl you see.
• tickle her even when she says stop.
• hold her hand when you're around your friends.
• when she starts swearing at you, tell her you love her.
• let her fall asleep in your arms.
• get her mad, then kiss her.
• stay on the phone with her even if shes not saying anything
• tease her and let her tease you back.
• stay up all night with her when she's sick.
• watch her favorite movie with her.
• give her the world.
• let her wear your clothes.
• when she's sad, hang out with her.
• let her know she's important.
• kiss her in the pouring rain.
• when you fall in love with her, tell her.
• and when you tell her, love her like you've never loved someone before.

girl and guy facts

When you catch a girl
glancing at you,
she wants you to look
back and smile

When a girl bumps into your arm
while walking with you
she wants
you to hold her hand

When she wants a hug
she will just stand there

When u break a girls heart
she still feels it when
you run into each other 3 years later

When a girl is quiet,
millions of things are running through her
mind

When a girl is not arguing,
she is thinking deeply

When a girl looks at you with eyes full of
questions,
she is wondering how long you will be
around

When a girl answers, "I'm fine," after a
few seconds,
she is not at all fine

When a girl stares at you,
she is wondering why you are playing games

When a girl lays her head on your chest,
she is wishing for you to be hers forever

When a girl says she can't live
without you,
she has made up her mind that you are
her future

When a girl says, "I miss you,"
no one in this world can miss you more
than that

When a girl is mean to you after a break-up
she wants you back, but shes
scared she'll get hurt and knows
you're gone forever

--------GUYS--------------

Guy Facts:

When a guy calls you,
he wants to be with you

When a guy is quiet,
He's listening to you...

When a guy is not arguing,
He realizes he's wrong

When a guy says, "I'm fine." after a few
minutes
he means it

When a guy stares at you,
he wishes you would care about him and
wonders if you do

When your laying your head on a guy's
chest,
he has the world

When a guy calls/texts/comments you everyday,
he is in love

When a (good) guy tells you he loves you,
he means it

When a guy says he can't live without you,
he's with you til your done

When a guy says, "I miss you,"
he misses you more than you could have
ever missed him or anything else
